apikey.comment: Sign up for an account at collectapi.com, then get your API key at collectapi.com/auth

dailyretrieve.headers.comment: Headers to be included in the request.
headers: authorization: apikey someapikey:valueishere. After signing up for an accout at collectapi.com, subscribe to free tier and get your api key
